column4: Somehow my root "/" folder became writable. What do I have to do to fix this?
all. Or so said the warning. I went and my non-root account can make/delete files there but it wasn't recursive thankfully.
maybe its the webservers / that its talking about ? I doubt your systems / is writable.. in any case, for apache try #apache, dunno if lighthttp has a channel here but it should be easy to find :)
